narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C" license.  
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The pre-licensing process,  including payment of licensing fees, must be completed by 8/17/2017 or the applicant
will forfeit the application fee and will be required to wait 6 months to reapply. No regulated activity may be
conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the owner.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
